ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
instructions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add ground beef and onion to skillet and season with garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Cook and stir until beef is completely browned, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease.
Stir chili sauce, green bell pepper, and tomato sauce into the beef mixture; reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, stirring regularly, until the sauce is thick, about 30 minutes.
title: Women's Club Sloppy Joes

normalized_ingredients.586: salt and ground black pepper to taste

steps: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add ground beef and onion to skillet and season with garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Cook and stir until beef is completely browned, 5 to 7 minutes; drain and discard grease.

Return skillet to stove top. Stir chili sauce, green bell pepper, and tomato sauce into the beef mixture; reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, stirring regularly, until the sauce is thick, about 30 minutes.
